com.example.java

Class User1

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.java.ShipsGameBase
      • com.example.java.User1

  • public class User1
extends ShipsGameBase
    player 1 class, it contains the ship fields with the ship id's and their hit counters. It also contains the methods that allow user to allocate the ships and shot at the opponent ships

                                     int theShipLength,

      • isTheShipDown

        public boolean isTheShipDown(java.lang.String[] userBoard,
                             int i)
        the method is used to check if the ship is destroyed, it checks the ship id on the opponent board and increments the ship hit counter accordingly and returns a "is the ship down" boolean value.
        Parameters:
        userBoard -
        i - - integer value, array index of the user's shot
        Returns:
        - boolean value
